name: Convert to/from binary data
semantic_context: Move data between binary and JSON properties
natural_language_description: 这是 Convert to/from binary data 节点。主要用于: Move data between binary and JSON properties

mode.name: mode
mode.description: From and to where data should be moved
mode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Mode | 作用: From and to where data should be moved | 默认值: binaryToJson
available_options: Binary to JSON (值: binaryToJson) - Move data from Binary to JSON
JSON to Binary (值: jsonToBinary) - Move data from JSON to Binary

setAllData.name: setAllData
setAllData.description: Whether all JSON data should be replaced with the data retrieved from binary key. Else the data will be written to a single key.
setAllData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Set All Data | 作用: Whether all JSON data should be replaced with the data retrieved from binary key. Else the data will be written to a single key. | 默认值: True

sourceKey.name: sourceKey
sourceKey.description: The name of the JSON key to get data from. It is also possible to define deep keys by using dot-notation like for example: "level1.level2.currentKey".
sourceKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source Key | 作用: The name of the JSON key to get data from. It is also possible to define deep keys by using dot-notation like for example: "level1.level2.currentKey". | 默认值: data | (必填项)

destinationKey.name: destinationKey
destinationKey.description: The name the binary key to copy data to. It is also possible to define deep keys by using dot-notation like for example: "level1.level2.newKey".
destinationKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Destination Key | 作用: The name the binary key to copy data to. It is also possible to define deep keys by using dot-notation like for example: "level1.level2.newKey". | 默认值: data | (必填项)

convertAllData.name: convertAllData
convertAllData.description: Whether all JSON data should be converted to binary. Else only the data of one key will be converted.
convertAllData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Convert All Data | 作用: Whether all JSON data should be converted to binary. Else only the data of one key will be converted. | 默认值: True

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: addBOM (值: None) - Whether to add special marker at the start of your text file. This marker helps some programs understand how to read the file correctly.
dataIsBase64 (值: None) - Whether to keep the binary data as base64 string
encoding (值: None) - Choose the character set to use to encode the data
fileName (值: None) - The file name to set
jsonParse (值: None) - Whether to run JSON parse on the data to get proper object data
keepSource (值: None) - Whether the source key should be kept. By default it will be deleted.
keepAsBase64 (值: None) - Whether to keep the binary data as base64 string
mimeType (值: None) - The mime-type to set. By default will the mime-type for JSON be set.
useRawData (值: None) - Whether to use data as is and do not JSON.stringify it
